hero.tagline: I work on real-world infrastructure projects while delivering engineering solutions through structural detailing, BIM modeling, and precision-driven documentation. Alongside core civil engineering practice, I develop digital tools and web-based systems that improve workflow efficiency, automation, and project coordination — integrating physical construction expertise with modern digital engineering.
hero.status: Engineering infrastructure through structure, systems, and digital intelligence.
hero.openTo: Open to collaborations · BIM · Web tools · Automation

about.excerpt: Civil Engineer & BIM technologist integrating field experience with web tools and automation.
paragraphs: I am a Licensed Civil Engineer working at the intersection of infrastructure development and digital engineering. My work combines structural design thinking, BIM-based workflows, and precision technical documentation to deliver reliable and efficient engineering solutions.

Alongside traditional civil engineering practice, I develop digital tools and automation systems that improve coordination, workflow efficiency, and project execution. I approach engineering as an integrated system — where physical construction and digital intelligence work together to create smarter, more scalable infrastructure.

points: Working on BIM-based modeling and detailing workflows for infrastructure projects.
Preparing and coordinating detailed CAD and Revit drawings for execution and documentation.
Involved in soil profiling, geotechnical drawings, and technical detailing based on site data.
Coordinating with design and site teams to align BIM models and drawings with on-ground execution.
Actively exploring workflow improvements using Revit, BIM standards, and structured documentation practices.
Led development and coordination of web-based projects using React and Tailwind CSS.
Managed small teams, assigned tasks, and ensured timely project delivery.
Solved technical and design challenges while maintaining project quality.
Gained hands-on experience in leadership, problem-solving, and modern frontend development workflows.
